grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 大帝【タイテイ】great emperor, ... the Great
kun reading compounds: 帝【みかど】emperor (of Japan), mikado, (the gates of an) imperial residence
帝揚羽【みかどあげは】common jay (species of swallowtail butterfly, Graphium doson)
時の帝【ときのみかど】emperor of the time
